item.description:
http://www.internationalwomensday.com/about.asp

Function room of Brook House served us well on Winter Holidays, now its time to greet Spring!!

Pot luck, again, your favorite dish, RSVP with what you are cooking, we have a kitchen, oven there. bring your drink. I ll provide dishes, and paying for the room. Email with questions.

Come up with more ideas of celebrations, games, organization of event.

Looking forward!!

Stay warm and safe until!!

Maia 781-781-6203

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Celebrate Women's Day !!
